option.name: lspConfiguration
option.value: { "inspectPort": null, "emmetCompletions": true, "classAttributes": [ "class", "className", "ngClass", "class:list" ], "classFunctions": [], "codeActions": true, "codeLens": true, "hovers": true, "suggestions": true, "validate": true, "colorDecorators": true, "rootFontSize": 16, "lint": { "cssConflict": "warning", "invalidApply": "error", "invalidScreen": "error", "invalidVariant": "error", "invalidConfigPath": "error", "invalidTailwindDirective": "error", "invalidSourceDirective": "error", "recommendedVariantOrder": "warning", "usedBlocklistedClass": "warning" }, "showPixelEquivalents": true, "includeLanguages": { "kt": "html" }, "files": { "exclude": [ "**/.git/**", "**/.hg/**", "**/.svn/**", "**/node_modules/**", "**/.yarn/**", "**/.venv/**", "**/venv/**", "**/.next/**", "**/.parcel-cache/**", "**/.svelte-kit/**", "**/.turbo/**", "**/__pycache__/**" ] }, "experimental": { "configFile": "site/src/jsMain/resources/styles.css", "classRegex": [ ["tw\\s*\\(([^)]*)\\)", "\"([^\"]*)\""] ] } }
